## Purpose

Isolating insert for gibson assembly from the montium species.

## Samples

primers: 
ruf_gibson_F1_cm	ccagatccaggtcgcagcGTTACCCGGTACTGCATAACA
ruf_gibson_R1_cm	tggcaataagtaccgtagAGTTGCTGGGACTTAATTTGA

1. D. birchii
2. D. bocki
3. D. jambulina
4. D. melanogastor
5. D. rufa

6-14 all D. rufa.

## Program

Samples 1-5

| step | temp       |  time  |
|------|------------|--------|
| 1    | 95         | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95         | 15 sec |
| 3    | 64         | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72         | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72         | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4          | hold   |

Samples 6-14 all rufa

Annealing goes from 

6.) 55
7.) 56
8.) 57.6
9.)59.5
10.) 61.6
11.) 63.8
12.) 65.9
13.) 67.8
13.) 69.4
